Austin Strategic Direction 2023 Dasbhoard

This dashboard shows the City of Austin's progress on the six strategic outcomes within the Strategic Direction 2023.

Click here to read the complete Strategic Direction 2023.

Economic Opportunity & Affordability

  • Employment
  • Income equality
  • Cost of living compared to income
  • Housing
  • Homelessness
  • Training for jobs
  • Economic mobility

Mobility

  • System efficiency and congestion
  • Transportaiton cost
  • Access to multi-modal transportation
  • Safety
  • Transportation-related infrastructure

Safety

  • Success of emergency response
  • Compliance with laws
  • Emergency preparedness
  • Fair administration of justice
  • Critical infrastructure

Health & Environment

  • Healthy conditions
  • Access to quality health care services
  • Access to parks
  • Environmental quality
  • Climate change and resilience
  • Food security and nutrition

Culture & Lifelong Learning

  • Cultural venues and events
  • Vibrancy and sustainability
  • Welcoming to all people and cultures
  • Preservation of heritage
  • Lifelong learning opportunities

Government that Works for All

  • Financial cost
  • Condition/quality of City infrastructure
  • Satisfaction with City services
  • Employee engagement
  • Stakeholder engagement
  • Equity of City programs
  • Transparency and ethical practices
